website_summaries.verdict: A good mattress option for anyone looking for the most amount of comfort and give during their sleep time.
pros: Twelve-inch thick mattress offers more height and comfort than most traditional mattresses
Comes with a two-inch layer of gel foam for better body support
cons: Mattress edges tend to sink in if you sit on the side to get on or off the bed

customer_reviews.title: Night and Day difference between this and other memory foam mattresses we have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! incredible difference between other memory foam mattresses that we have tried vs. this mattress. The top of the mattress is so soft and breathable. The delivery and setup were easy. The strange smell from the mattress was gone within a few hours. Just let it breath for a while.
customer_reviews.author: BHP

customer_reviews.title: Our guests keep pulling up the sheets to see what brand it is, because it's so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our guest room, and guests keep pulling up the sheets and mattress cover to see what brand it is - it is SO comfortable! Perfect combination of coils and gel, and it still fits in a small package. This is the minimum width (12 inch) that I would buy, I've had the 8" width and it's not as comfortable. Really an excellent mattress at a terrific price! It feels very soft and plush when you first lay on it, but then you realize that there is a nice firmness supporting you below the top layer. I like this as much as our much more expensive memory foam mattress that we bought in a sleep store.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great balance of plush and firm!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad, and got two more for my nieces. Only got the first one, because I bought it earlier. It is incredibly comfortable! Not to mention, NO SMELL! That was a surprise! As for softness or firmness, I would say it's about an 8/10 for softness. You definitely sink in, it does feel very plush, but I don't think it's "Ultra Plush." The firmness is just right.
customer_reviews.author: A-moon-amous

customer_reviews.title: and my husband and I LOVE this mattress
customer_reviews.text: One week in, and my husband and I LOVE this mattress. It replaced an 18+ year old spring mattress, so note that our comparison is not some $$$ fancy brand mattress. This mattress supports us well, insulates me from hubby's "flip turns" in bed at night (which used to wake me up!) No idea if it will be durable, but for the price point we could replace it every three years and still come ahead of an expensive name brand mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and stays cool!
customer_reviews.text: We got the king size mattress and we've had this mattress for a few weeks now and we love it! It's really soft (but not overly soft) and it keep us cool at night. I was worried because of the Gel Memory foam top because my husband sleeps really hot and our last memory foam bed made us sweat at night and didn't hold shape very well so we would roll together. But I'm happy that this mattress does not do either of those things! We've been sleeping so much better because this mattress stays cool and doesn't make us roll into each other during the night. Would definitely recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great guest bed
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is surprisingly wonderful. It's hands-down THE most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on. It's plush, soft, and supportive. Squishy and springy. I'm actually sad I only bought one for the guest room. I am seriously considering buying one for my own bed. The only concerns I have are longevity and off-gassing. It does have that memory-foam smell that I'm sure will diminish over time. It feels like a bed that will satisfy all my guests.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress and loved it. I have had it 13 months and now I have to buy a new one. I weigh close to 200 pounds and it has caused an indentation in it. My back is killing me when I get up in the morning. I am 75 years old and just can't deal with this anymore. NOT a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: HOLY SOFTNESS!
customer_reviews.text: Only out of the packaging for 3 hours and oh my sweet lawd I’ve died and gone to heaven! Whoever says this mattress is firm is asmoka ze cracka because this bed is AMAZING! The firmer foundation with the soft memory foam on top makes a perfect combo! I cannot WAIT to go to bed tonight!
customer_reviews.author: VegasMom

customer_reviews.title: Incredible support!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today, way ahead of the date stated when we ordered. The mattress was tightly rolled, clean and fluffy. It unrolled itself so fast we had a hard time getting the plastic off fast enough! There is so much support built into this mattress. I had wondered if the few inches of foam and gel would be enough support on top of the innerspring, but it feels great. Spent a very comfortable nap in some of the best sleep in years! When we go to replace other mattresses in the house, I'll definitely be ordering more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Dalian

customer_reviews.title: I wish this company was like casper with a 100 day trial
customer_reviews.text: I have had the mattress since Feb 27th. This mattress has zero support. I have has nothing but back and shoulder pain. When my husband and I are laying at the same time we sink into the middle. I am out of date to do a return . I wish this company was like casper with a 100 day trial.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, very plush
customer_reviews.text: Very plush soft and comfortable. holds heat a bit but the comfort is outstanding! If you like a bed you can sink into, this is it. we put an adjustable bedframe under it and have had no problems. super great and will order another if the need arises. thanks Linenspa for a great mattress at a super price.
customer_reviews.author: MH444

customer_reviews.title: Garbage after about a year
customer_reviews.text: I had very high hopes for this mattress after reading all of the great reviews. It’s not a terrible mattress by any means, but it isn’t as pillow soft as people keep saying. I guess it’s as good as you would expect it to be coming from a box and all. Edited review: have had this for a month or two now, more and more comfortable each passing week! Editing again after having it for almost 2 years: Currently searching for a new mattress. Most nights I wake up after about 6 hours of sleep and have to move to the chair in my bedroom to alleviate the pain this mattress causes. Low back pain and sore hips almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine yesterday. UPS brought it a couple days later than originally expected but it was brought right to my condo door. It came rolled tight in a box as mentioned. It was quite heavy. I laid it onto my frame and opened the plastic. Immediately it started taking in air. As I unrolled it, pulling off the plastic it became a plush mattress. I am impressed by the packaging and the mattress itself. Last night was my first night sleeping on it. I'm normally a side sleeper and I felt supported in any position I slept in. Overall great experience.
customer_reviews.author: NLPflug

customer_reviews.title: It took a great deal of convincing of my husband that we needed ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a great deal of convincing of my husband that we needed a new mattress. He did not want to change. However the two low places on each side of the bed finally got to me. I ordered the bed and when it arrived he was prepared to hate it. But after one night of sleeping on it, he apologized and told me this was a great idea!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Benson

customer_reviews.title: Not 12" and hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a 12" ultra plush mattress. It is neither. I let it expand for 3 hours like the directions stated. It measures in at an underwhelming 10" and was so hard the first night I tried to sleep on it I woke up 2 hours later in excruciating pain. I had to sleep in my recliner. Tomorrow I will get my old mattress back on my bed and find a way to return this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: May Result In Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: First off, some may identify the bed as “too soft”. This was the opinion of a few of my friends who tested the mattress. My problem was however, the mattress is too small for my liking. It’s almost 2 inches shorter too. I wanted to return and replace my mattress for the Queen size. I have opened the mattress and now amazon won’t help me with suggesting how I make my return and order a replacement. I just moved into my new apartment and this Linenspa mattress ordering couldn’t be more of a hassle. Such a dissapointment and headache to me personally. Honestly, when I purchase from an online retailer/brand, I expect better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealInfluencer

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: If you like a firm mattress, this is not the mattress you are looking for. This has a very plush feel to it but I like it. I have had back problems and waking up stiff when I used to have a firm mattress. now that I have switched, I haven’t had any issues. There is a smell when you open it up from the plastic but that could just be from the plastic itself. Almost like the smell of wet paint. That smell does fade after a few days but it wasn’t strong enough to bother me to begin with. All in all, good mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Beware, ours has a strong, intollerable smell that is not going away
customer_reviews.text: After two days out of the package our still has such a powerful chemical smell that my wife will not go anywhere near it. I find it comfortable but whatever is coming out of it could be a deal breaker. The smell is so strong I wonder if ours is somehow defective. If the smell is not at least diminishing in the next few days we will have not choice other than returning it.
customer_reviews.author: coppersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Realistically the most comfortable bed I've laid on
customer_reviews.text: Both this product, and Amazon customer support, are fantastic. I ended up having to do a return on my first mattress (the first inflated very slowly and had a permanent ridge along the mattress face in the memory foam) which Amazon was great in working with me on, and the second one is perfect. This mattress is amazingly comfortable, and I would definitely wait at least 24 hours (I waited 48) before you sleep on it to allow it to expand and reach it's optimal firmness/softness. Such a great price for an amazing product, and supplied though a source that cares.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress ever!!!!!! I haven't slept the good in a very very long time. Awesome support and not a sound when I get in and out of bed. It took me a while to make a choice because I was making an online purchase and I wanted to make the right choice. Even my daughter likes the mattress. I will be purchasing her mattress with this company
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: One year review.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something fast and affordable. This matress has served it's intended purpose. I read the reviews and what I noticed is no one had reviews based on long term use. So. . After sleeping on it for a year I can say I'm not super impressed but not totally disappointed. It is soft. It is comfortable but not as comfortable as a pillow top spring matress. If you're not used to a foam matress then go with a conventional one. It is sturdy on the edges and has not fell short on that. It has held up well. For the money and time I had I'm not disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A Hourihan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and so so comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband researched high and low about these mattresses. Name-brand vs. off-brand (like this one) and ultimately found/decided on this mattress. We decided to try it out, also since it is way cheaper what is the harm in trying? We purchased in Nov '19 and fast forward to today, we are still loving it and have had no issues. As a human with Spina Bifida Occulta (aka spine birth defect), I need a semi-firm but still comfy mattress and this has been one of the best I have ever laid on! It comes in a long, but compact box and we could easily lift it to get it in the bedroom. Puffed up quickly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Word

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress! It is the softest mattress ever! We recently bought our toddler the 8 inch twin mattress and it was so comfortable so my husband and I decided to get a king size for ourselves and it is great!! I am pregnant and the memory foam fully forms to my body while sleeping on my side. As soon as we get up it quickly goes back to its normal shape. It is the softest mattress we have ever laid on. It did smell like chemicals or paint right after we took it out but we opened the windows and the smell was completely gone the next day. So far we are loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ci Bratt

customer_reviews.title: Plush mattress at a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came in a box, but it was still heavy to move. A month in and we love how it feels and the money we saved went to new tv for the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jc0308

customer_reviews.title: Over 5 days and reluctant to even test this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We read the Reviews first which is where LinenSpa states that this mattress is Certi-Pur. If that's true, why not state upfront in the main description page? We doubt this is true. Windows are left open, fan is on, yet still strong out-gassing smell. Not much else to say at the point since sheets are not even on this mattress while we wait for the sickly chemical smell to fade. We wouldn't have purchased if we knew about this.
customer_reviews.author: visualgirl

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I did my research called the company even and ask them for their softest most comfortable mattress this thing did not last a month! It doesn't just sag it is lumpy uncomfortable I am in pain it is horrible! It had an odd feeling right from the start almost puffy like air after that went it was all downhill I can feel the springs inside of it I am 5.6" 153lb so not extreme weight ! buy an air mattress you'll be better off if you can't afford a better quality mattress please save your money I wish I had! And I went into this not expecting it to last but a few years but weeks or months is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Ravkia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Softness
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with these mattress (we got two) for king adjustable bed. We're both side sleepers and now, with these mattresses, no longer toss and turn and wake up with shoulder pain. In fact we sink in and both barely reposition during the night. We found no bugs at all in the mattress as others have said. My only recommendation is that if you are getting the mattresses for an adjustable king bed you get the twin XL. I should have known better and ordered the twin regular length. I measured wrong! Learn from my error! We did let them air out for a full day before sleeping on them, there has been no order.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mattress plus the customer service is A+
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress to be used on a motorized frame where the head and feet raise/lower and it works well. I like a softer mattress and after having a different brand memory foam type mattress, this one is much more comfortable for me. I purchased 2 of these TwinXL mattresses to make a king sized bed and had an issue with one of them and customer service took care of me no problem at all. Every so often "stuff happens" and it's nice to know the company stands behind their products. I recommend this mattress especially if you like a softer mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: FAIL.
customer_reviews.text: i thought it was going to be comfortable. NOPE, my husband and i can hardly move in the mornings because we wake up in so much pain. i have to constantly move in the night because i wake up in pain on my hips, shoulders and back. never get a solid hour of rest. bought a 2007 Simmons Beauty rest from a friend.. BEST NIGHTS SLEEP IN MONTHS!! come get your bed back its a total FAIL.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you can get a better mattress for lots more money; however, this is the best I have had for a reasonable price. I have a really bad back and a hip replacement, and this has given me the best night's sleep I've had in years. For the first time in a long time, I awoke without the usual pain and stiffness. I'm a side-sleeper, and it provides both support and flexibility. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McBrair

customer_reviews.title: Caused severe back issues.
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost a year since I bought this item, and after a few months of using it, I started to have back pains that I just didn't know what to do. I went to multiple specialists and nothing. I recently switched mattress and in just a few days my back stop hurting. It's crazy that a simple buy in Amazon caused my so much pain for so long. Not again. Super frustrated. watch out and don't this item if your health is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: dima

customer_reviews.title: Good value hybrid mattress
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a bed-in-box memory foam mattress that felt like sleeping on concrete. It was designed for those that want a very firm mattress. I was , with concerned about making another mistake with an on- line purchase, but decided to do it anyway. I made the right choice, this is a real good value in a hybrid mattress. Other mattresses like this one were much more money. I'm sure there are others that are as good or better, but not for the price. I recommend the Linenspa.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Mattress came in dirty and I assume it's used and reboxed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to sleep on it and wont be. This came dirty out of the box and I can only assume it's a used mattress that has been re-boxed. Honestly this is simply disgusting and I cannot sleep in a mattress that looks used by someone else. Trying to figure out how to return it now so that may be a fiasco.
customer_reviews.author: G. Loukas

customer_reviews.title: MATTRESS IS JUST 10' THICK
customer_reviews.text: The12" hybrid mattress that I received decompressed to just 10" thick after 72 hours! It appears that I am not the only one that has purchased this mattress and it failed to grow 12" thick as described. Very disappointed in QC Have you ever tried to fit a compressed mattress back into the same box it was shipped in? It's impossible! Calling Amazon in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: WOW.. I was sold when I saw over 22,000 reviews even though several were not good.The mattress lived up to the 5 star ratings it got over 70% of the time. Easy to carry from the delivery to the bed open with ease inflated as promised 11.25 inches at 2 corners that fully inflated after 72 hrs. To sit on it was much softer than I thought. But to lie on it was divine. Amazing support cool and so much more comfartable than any other mattress we have currently. Amazing.....
customer_reviews.author: patrick Murtagh

customer_reviews.title: Aaaahhh...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a bed-in-a-box in the past w/a positive experience, and this was no different. Mattress fit well in my platform bed with slat system. Mattress was well-packaged. There was no major distress on the box, w/mattress secured well inside the box. Feels comfortable...not too soft and not too firm. I didn't notice much of a smell initially after "self-inflation", however my son said it had a scent of markers. At any rate, it dissipated quickly...24 hrs. I rated it 4/5 due to my expectations of a taller mattress. Overall, I am quite pleased w/this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Persnickety

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like a plush mattress this is the best there is. The coils give the bed a slight bounce and the memory foam let’s ykur body sink in. The gel keeps the bed cool as well. I don’t usually write reviews but felt so strongly about this product especially considering the price. We’ll see how it holds up but I’ve owned other Linenspa products in the past and have been really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: briiilowe

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT WHAT PLUSH MEANS
customer_reviews.text: If you read ULTRA PLUSH in the article description and you think it's going to be soft and like a cloud then you would be wrong. It's MEDIUM FIRM at best. I've used it for less than a week and my back and neck are killing me. Do yourself a favor and go to a brick and mortar mattress store so you can try it before you buy it. Now i'm stuck trying to sell if on craigslist or LetGo and take the loss because returning it doesn't seem to be an option.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH SY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this bed! We bought a used RV and had to replace the mattress. We have a super duper amazing mattress on our bed at home but didn't want to spend $3000 for the mattress in our camper but needed to have comfortable, quality sleep. I took a chance on this mattress and am impressed and so satisfied! It is super soft and plush. My husband and I get great sleep on this, and we go out for weeks at a time. I would actually replace my house mattress with this one when the time comes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best mattress I have ever  bought!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are a tough couple to please when it comes to mattresses. I have to have some softness in order to prevent joint pain as well as needing some support. My husband is all about a firm mattress. So we do have a hard time getting one that gives a good night's sleep to both of us. This one fits the bill perfectly! Great for me...as a side-sleeper I need softness for hips, shoulders and knees. Perfect for him....great back support! Add to that the plus of a great price and delivery right to your door! I would purchase this mattress again....and again....and again!
customer_reviews.author: lucrown

customer_reviews.title: Sags - after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review when I first received the mattress that it was terrific- —-now a few months later the mattress sags and is lopsided— you get what you pay for — just got a top of the line Serta— this goes in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: MIAMI 10000

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is great. It is equal firm but with a nice squishy foam to make it feel cloud like. It came quick and the box wasn't to terribly big. There was a little damage on the outside of the box but none on the bed wrapping. But be warned that the bed rolled and packed weighed as much as a semi-truck! Get a hand or hand truck before trying to bring it in because the UPS guy may leave it for you at the front steps and leave. Mine did but that's UPS's fault. Linenspa thanks for a great bed and also the lifetime warranty. Big plus+
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good but not all that I dreamed of.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to read mattress reviews and know what you are getting. This is a nice mattress. I am happy with the purchase. I was hoping for a very plush, sleeping on clouds kind of mattress. This hasn't been quite there for my wife or me. I am 6'1 and 215lbs she is 5'5 and 125 lbs. Our old beauty rest was softer but we were upgrading to a king. We have had it about two months now. There was an initial odor but it went away in a few days. The mattress come in a vacuum sealed bag in a box. It expanded as described. Again, overall good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Understand what you're getting and the importance of your bedframe
customer_reviews.text: I have to rant a bit here. I see people complaining about things that have nothing to do with the mattress! If your nightly "workouts" are noisy its because of your bedframe or boxspring or headboard, or all of the above - not the mattress. Is your mattress sagging in the middle? Ok, did you check your bedframe to make sure ALL your supports are in, especially the middle ones? Bet you $50 there's your problem. This is a fantastic mattress. It has the comfort of foam without the heat (it has gel infused) and without the "stuck" feeling (it has coils underneath). Love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hay

customer_reviews.title: Toxic Smell
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was delivered two days ago. I can only imagine how bad the smell would have been had it not been the middle of summer and every window in my house is already open. Both my children told me the smell gave them headaches and after two nights of sleep my lungs hurt. A new mattress should not smell like this. I am in the process of returning it. I am VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Oooooooo Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing very very soft it came rolled it took one day to completely expand but as soon as i un rolled it , it started to expand. There was no stinky smell trust me I am big on smells but no stains it was good and clean. This mattress is definitely memory foam. And the only reason I gave a low star for pain relief is because even though this mattress is soft it can’t cure my back pain. But that isn’t there fault. But this was definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Ramrakha

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how bad my old mattress was until we purchased this for a guest bed. I liked it so much I switched it to my bed (sorry guests) and its great. Sleeps relatively cool. Offers good support (I'm a side/stomach sleeper) but is still soft and comfortable. Definitely not a "firm" mattress but the support is so good that I wake up feeling better than I have in awhile--its really helped my hips and back. I checked several reviews and youtube videos and settled on this over others you can find on Amazon and I'm very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: B. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Bought first one for my daughter 8inch linenspa! My $3000 bed was sinking badly and was super hot didn’t want to spend the money so I invested in this one instead due to my daughter bed being so comfortable. Item came in on time. I would only recommend to inflate it next to your bedroom because it was a pain to move upstairs after opening. Other than that the best has been wonderful. So soft and cozy. Bought it in Sep its now Nov and I am still loving it!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Soft top but firm~fluffed up great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress, it was just what I was wanting w/o spending SO much money on one. It borders on being "too soft" but I do better w/ that than a hard mattress. It came nicely wrapped, unboxed great & fluffed up in no time. There was no smell~!!! It wouldn't have bothered me, but I know that matters to most consumers of mattresses. My brother ended getting one of these also....eventually we'll get one for the queen bed. Good price for good product. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Side Sleepers - this solved my shoulder pain!
customer_reviews.text: I felt I should write a review since the existing reviews helped me decide on this great mattress. I'm 6' - 235lbs and a side sleeper. I had purchased a Nectar mattress a year ago and it is a good mattress but too firm for me as I was waking up multiple times per night with sore shoulders and sometimes hips. The Nectar did not have enough "give" for my weight. The Linenspa is PERFECT! Plenty of support for your back but the top layer gives enough to support your hips and shoulders without pain. It has been a week now of great sleep and no pain plus the price is 1/2 of the Nectar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I took the chance... not sure, to say the least, and like many folks, and ordered this mattress for my (adult) son. AH-amazing! Super comfy! Have since purchased 2 more! Both sons love the mattress! There have been no bad smells, but DO allow time for the mattress to completely fill out before making bed. We purchased the tall frames for mattress and they’re great, as well. Great price for the mattresses, and I ordered both the king and Queen. No complaints and they love these!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. My wife and I have been sleeping on it for a week now and we are so happy we purchased it. If you like a firm mattress then this one is not for you. I weigh 150 lbs and my wife is 120 lbs. I cannot feel when she gets out of bed. My only complaint is that Amazon had the queen size originally at $279 but we purchased at $338 with tax. I was not expecting such a big price change, in such a short time period.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mangual

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: have had for a few days, inflated in 24 hrs, not to smelly, just left windows open for awhile, this mattress replaced a saatvia mattress, which was 3 times the cost, i am very happy so far , it is softer, but nice when your dog or partner moves you cannot feel it. will update after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleep in Years!
customer_reviews.text: Our first Linenspa experience was in Orlando at an Air BnB. I have advanced-stage Lyme Disease and do not often get good sleep. While on vacay, however, I slept better than I have in years! We loved the bed so much, we asked the condo owner to tell us the mattress company. They sent us pics of it and Linenspa’s customer service used the id# to determine the type of mattress. We promptly ordered a king-sized gel/foam hybrid in 12 in. We LoVE it! In fact, my sis slept on our bed while house-sitting and then ordered a new Linenspa for her house! Now we plan to get a guest bed at our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched mattresses for almost a year, however, after a year of in-depth comparisons, and deep research...nothing! I felt like I saw all the same comments of people saying, “Relieved back pain!” Or, “Gave me back pain!” And so on. Nothing concrete. But things changed once I stumbled upon this bed!! This mattress is so plush, yet supportive! It has edge support, and it’s a hybrid mattress which was important to me! Everyone who has slept on it has loved it, and some have bought it. Definitely definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and it doesn't budge an inch when I roll over. I have it on a pretty high frame but I like the height. After having a broken down traditional mattress, this one is great. Definitely sleeping better with no springs prodding me here and there and the lack of rocking/swaying when I move is great. My only complaint is the memory foam is rather hot and in summer it will probably be uncomfortable, but I get hot very easily. The average person would probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Postle

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress a year and a month ago. Now, I feel I can write a review. It is not plush. It is not like sleeping on a cloud. It is like a hard slab. And it especially does not help alleviate the pain in my shoulder and hips sleeping on my sides. Reason I bought this mattress was to help with pain in sleeping. It has made it worse. Glad I only paid $300 something for it, not the $500 something it is now. People need to wait at least 6 months before writing a review. I based my purchase on the 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Over a year ago I purchased one mattress. It rose to almost the height advertised. I kept it and enjoy it. i decided to buy a matching twin mattress even though the price is now higher. The mattress was a full 3 inches shorter than the first one, and the edges were sloped downwards. I returned it and had it replaced. The third mattress was unpacked and given a full week to rise. It never even reached 10 inches. I returned it a month ago and just received notice from the manufacturer that it has been received.
customer_reviews.author: grandma of 21

customer_reviews.title: 10 STAR mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: 10 star mattress! I'm 60 years old and this is the best mattress I've ever owned. After 48 hours, I slept on it and felt it envelop my body. I didn't toss and turn all night... slept the entire night through on the second night. Such a great value, and best mattress ever, I love it!!! I'll be completely satisfied if it lasts 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rutgers

customer_reviews.title: Not for full bodied adults.
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for an adult. Maybe a light weight adult. This mattress does not support weight and after 2 days it was convex shape as per. Felt like I was going to fall off and it inclined so my head was lower than the rest of me. Never became a flat surface. Trying to get up was truly difficult, like wallowing around trying to grab something or else roll off completely.
customer_reviews.author: dparker

customer_reviews.title: Not 12” and wouldn’t recommend for an adult!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my 2 & 3 year old boy rooms. We allowed this to expand in our unairconditioned room for 48hours before using it. We have had it about 2 weeks now and it has only expanded to 10”, not the advertised 12”. It works for my 2 & 3 year but I would not recommend this bed for adults. The edges are very soft and crumble under weight allowing you to roll right off the bed. I was planning to purchase this in a king for my guest room but after using it I won’t be doing that.
customer_reviews.author: CotaSnacks

customer_reviews.title: Incredible comfort
customer_reviews.text: I cannot emphasize how nice this mattress is. I'm dead serious. Sinking into this mattress after a long day of work is literal heaven! My old mattress was a basic coil spring with a box frame underneath. It was going on 15 years old, and while it did the job...that was about it. It didn't provide any real support, and I desperately needed some. I have degenerative arthritis in my lower back and hips, and would wake up to muscle spasms on a regular basis. I've been sleeping on this mattress for about a month and a half, and they've all but stopped. It cradles your hips and back while you sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have had mattress for almost a month now and I love it! Perfect amount of softness, but I have to say it did take a while to get used to the feel/sink of the memory foam when coming from a traditional spring mattress. Very very heavy, and did not notice a smell when first unpackaged. I will try to update my review as time goes along
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This matress is pretty great. It's as plush as I need it to be and delivery/set up was easy. Very comfortable. A lot of people mention the smell at first, but I kept the ceiling fan on while it expanded over a few hours. It had kind of a paint smell, but not to the level of it being a problem. With the fan it was gone by bedtime. I am only speaking for the twin size. I imagine a wider bed may be a different experience as far as a dip forming over time or smell, make sure to read those reviews specifically.
customer_reviews.author: ElleB

customer_reviews.title: Rounded around edges, not flat like a conventional mattress or shown in ad on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon image shows a nice looking flat mattress. The remaining image shows the Linenspa mattress after 7 days after contacting Linenspa twice about this, and getting a smug response from them on walking on the corners with clean socks to fix it, what a waste of time. Does it look like you’d get a decent nights sleep on this? Don't get too close to the edge!
customer_reviews.author: Megamind

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mattress if you would like to suffer from back pain!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress gave me terrible back pain after sleeping on it for the first night. I wasn't sure if it's just myself, so another family member tried it the following night and also woke up with severe back pain. And by the way, after waiting a full week from when we originally opened the package, the mattress only inflated to 9.5 inches instead of the advertised 12 inches. To Amazon's credit, they had a special team come out to pick up the mattress for return since it was too large for UPS shipping once we opened the vacuumed packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Taub

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, with some minor problems
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I was really eager to get this mattress after sleeping on a terrible, thin one for the past 4 1/2 years, and for the most part, was not disappointed. It's extremely comfortable and has very much helped me get a better night's sleep over the last month. My only complaint is that the mattress never fully expanded, even though I gave the maximum 48 hours before using it, and the top ends droop a bit as well (although it doesn't really affect my comfort in any big way). This is the only reason I gave it 4 out of 5. Definitely recommended, however.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress with a budget price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 12” hybrid gel memory foam and innerspring.I came from a 8” high density all foam mattress which was stiff as a rock. I am 5’8 189lbs and this bed fits me perfect. I spent months researching mattresses and decided this one with the price and average customer reviews. The only reason I docked 1 star is the edge support isn’t the greatest. Sometimes if you are laying right on the edge you will notice your body leaning off the bed. Comfort is great. The bed is plush on top and comparable to a pillow top mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Too soft to make it work
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress because I wanted something really soft and my last bed was just hard. I have had this mattress for awhile now and I can say it it too soft for me personally. And now Im starting to feel upper back pain in the mornings. I added a mattress topper to firm it up and that only worked for a little while. Also when two people of different weights are on it there is a huge shift. I should have done more research and just went into a store and actually sat on different mattresses. This whole experience has made me not want to order a mattress online again it’s too risky.
customer_reviews.author: JLeigh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered two mattresses in the past online at one of those big mattress companies and told myself I'd never order a mattress again without sitting/lying on it. Well, I did it again and this king mattress was inexpensive so my husband said before we received it "you get what you pay for so it will probably be awful". Well, this is the most comfortable mattress we've had. I like a softer mattress and he likes one that is more firm. We are both very happy and comfortable and getting good nights sleep! I also have pain in my hip and wake up in the middle of the night with excruciating pain. Not anymore! This mattress is wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: etown7119

customer_reviews.title: I imagine this is what falling into a sink hole would feel like...
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for over a month and I would return if I could. This mattress offers little to no support, and when laying on it you kind of just sink down. On the edge of the bed it's even worse... the mattress basically depresses to the very bottom like a panini or something. And it's not like my partner and I are particularly large as well. Overall, I wish I had gone with something else. Never really had a problem with a mattress offering so little support, and I'm not sure if it's a fluke or by design.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not the Support You Expect From A Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this mattress. It’s super soft, decent thickness, inflated nicely. I bought this one specifically because of the individually encased springs hybrid with the memory foam. Should be best of both worlds - comfort and support. However, the edges of this mattress lack integrity. If you’re a single sleeper, you’ll be fine. However, with two adults (one who prefers a pillow cocoon) plus the random nights of a kid crawling in at 3am, you need those edges! These edges roll off. You’ll find yourself moving towards the middle to avoid the edge slope. Annoying. I imagine it’s a massive hassle to send back and then I have to find a new one if I do! Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Terry

customer_reviews.title: Left it for 48 hours to puff back up. Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Left for 48 hours after unrolling it & taking it out of the plastic, to fully fluff up. Came quickly and was really easy to get to bedroom in our basement. The stairs are kind of tight, so getting a stiff normal mattress down them to the bedroom in our basement is a challenge. This was much easier. Bought it for a family member who recently moved in with us. He's in his 40's and has some pain and back issues. Once it had aired back out for 48 hours, it is the most comfortable mattress he has slept on in years!
customer_reviews.author: MN Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress ever. I am 65 y.o. And beginning to have arthritis pains here and there and this mattress allows me to wake in the morning without pain. I love the gentle, reinforcing feel of the foam. It is firm and supportive but soft and gentle. I really cannot say enough how much comfort I receive from this mattress. The only thing I did not like was the overly fake lavender odor but after a few days it has dissipated to a more acceptable level.
customer_reviews.author: Cia R.

customer_reviews.title: would rebuy. Love
customer_reviews.text: a little bit more firm then I would like but overall good mattress. Its comfortable, I sleep well. It actually puffed up faster then we expected although one corner kind of took its time. Great price! Honestly kept our last mattress longer then we should have because it was so expensive. Won't regret or think twice when the time comes to replace it because the value is so amazing. Never worrying about uncomfortable sleep again ❤
customer_reviews.author: Tonya W

customer_reviews.title: Getting sink spots
customer_reviews.text: I opened this mattress and it expanded quickly, I gave it time to expand before sleeping on it. When I did start sleeping on it it was so plush, so comfortable. But fast forward to now. My husband and I have sink spots from where we sleep. It is getting hot, uncomfortable. We have slept on it since December 2019 lots on money to just be in sink spots. He is 6'2 about 180 pound I'm 5'4 at 160 pound. Had high Hope's for this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Craft

customer_reviews.title: Fell asleep so easily
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a very old mattress and decided to get myself a much fancier mattress than the kids were getting. I’d been very happy with the 6” and 8” mattresses I’d purchased from this brand for the bunk beds, so I decided to purchase my own mattress from this brand. I’m so glad I did! Very comfortable without being frighteningly expensive. A great value and some of the best sleep I’ve had in years.
customer_reviews.author: Rabidus Matris

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not what I was hoping..😢..I was praying this was the one..but alas i was wrong..🤦‍♂️...I Regretfully suggest not to purchase this product for comfort..for you will not find it here..🤧...a guest bed at best..where no one whatsoever has to sleep on this mattress for more then a weekend...😲...I was very unsatisfied with my purchase..and i unsure you,that you will be as well within 3 to 6 months...even after letting it set for 72 hour on a flat surface...spinning the mattress from foot to head..does not work as well...I am miserable until my income tax returns come in..pray for me...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen N. Ford

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN, GREAT BUY, NO BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy this because of the bed bugs reviews, however after receiving the mattress that is VERY clean, NO bed bugs, I’m so glad I did! Great quality and comfort for the price. I don’t see how bed bugs could ever be on these unused wrapped and sealed mattresses..I think the people either had bed bugs (maybe why they got new mattresses) or are trying to sabotage Linenspa. Don’t listen either way! We almost spend $2600 on a mattress store mattress and I’m so glad we didn’t, this feels just like the one we almost spent all the money on!
customer_reviews.author: Ashhhhhh

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the money
customer_reviews.text: I had read a lot of reviews on this mattress. There were several that said there were bed bugs and other complaining about chemical smell and some saying it never fully decompressed. My experience was nothing but good. Chemical smell was there but lasted maybe 2 days at most. Mattress was fully decompressed within 24 hrs. No sign of bed bugs. It is very comfortable, if you like a medium firm mattress. My wife and I both have slept well and comfortable every night for the week we've had it and our body aches are gone. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Spen

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 Year Review, did not last.
customer_reviews.text: I am already looking for a replacement for this mattress after 1 and a half years... honestly would have started looking earlier if it weren't for the pandemic and uncertainty about my income. I can no longer sleep comfortably on this mattress now because half of it is completely indented so no matter what position I sleep in, I end up rolled over into the indention or wedged between the mattress and the back wall of my daybed. I was really happy with it when I first got it.. but of course, it did not last.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NO edge support. Don't be fooled by the positive reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew about edge support until I bought this mattress. If you sit on the edge of the bed, you WILL just quickly slide right off. I've never experienced anything like it. If you can afford something better, definitely invest in a better quality mattress. Basically, no grown adult with a job will use a mattress like this. This mattress is essentially for younger/college student types. Don't make my mistake, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: jmath

customer_reviews.title: Plush top, firmer support beneath.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect mix of springs and memory foam for people who suffer from lower back and/or hip pain. This feels plush on top but still has a medium firm support beneath the memory foam. My wife and I are getting the best sleep we’ve had in years! Both of us are 250+ lbs for anyone who may be concerned about how it holds up to heavier bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Mistelle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but not 100% expanded
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old 15 YO firm matress with the 12 inch gel matress from linenspa. I have to say It's very comfortable. However I give it three stars because it never completely expanded from the foot of the mattress it's been more than three days also, The matress seems smaller than my old queen and it doesn't fully fill my boxed bed frame? However I don't want to go thought the whole returning the mattress because it's a pain in the butt to me. Also I read on the reviews about beg bugs. I did see some tiny debree in the packaging I analyzed it and it's NOT bed bugs probably from the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cozy and  comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our camper to replace a previous mattress that was hard as a rock. We literally melted in this mattress, super soft and comfy. If you don't like a soft mattress, not the mattress for you! My husband slept well also, but he said he tended to roll to the middle, which bothered him, but I slept like a baby the two weeks we stayed in the camper and loved it! Can't wait for the next trip to use the mattress again! May have to buy the king size for our every day mattress!
customer_reviews.author: MissBeck

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant purchasing a mattress online, but so glad that I did. Hybrid mattresses are now all that I recommend to others when looking for one. It is soft yet gives support. The very low price tag makes it such a bargain. Bought three of these mattresses (in different sizes).
customer_reviews.author: Yachai

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy. I like it firm :)
customer_reviews.text: It’s on the softer side and the edges squish down completely when you sit on the end/sides of the bed. Very disappointed in overall product. But better than a rundown hotel mattress so it’s basically middle of the run. Would love to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 outta 5 overall. Softer than most but no cloud
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the fluffiest, softest thing ever. Both my husband and I (150 and 120# respectively), have some sink into the mattress, but it’s not the cloud others reported. Pros- arrived on time, in good condition. Not too heavy to carry in, no smell, great price. Cons- edges still haven’t fully erected after 2 weeks post unboxing, leaving down/outward slanting edges to the whole unit. Is more a ‘soft to medium’ than a ‘soft’ mattress. Durability is TBD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but not 12"
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is COMFY. I've had it for a week now and my only issue is that it did not expand to the full 12". It's higher up in the middle, but the sides and especially the corners sag down, about 10.5" and 9.5" respectively, which you can see in the picture. I don't know if this is because it sat rolled up in the warehouse for too long or what, considering I can see from some other people's reviews that it expanded just fine. I also added a quilted plush topper since I like my beds VERY soft. And this mattress is pretty soft for memory foam, but I needed a little more squish. Overall 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: cheekyholmes

customer_reviews.title: SO comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 twin 12in mattresses for two kids. The mattresses both inflated rather quickly and met the 12in height advertised. The description advertises either plush or ultra plush and we can easily say that they are definitely plush. The mattresses are extremely comfortable! Definitaly worth the purchase of both and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps hot, pressure point pain
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is already showing signs of valleys where we sleep. We chose this particular mattress because it was rated high to decrease pressure points. Instead, it has done the opposite. We are extremely disappointed with the sleeping valleys which I think cause the pressure points to be more pronounced. And it seems to be a hot mattress to sleep on. (I usually sleep year round with a heated mattress pad on due to always being cold, but it stays off and yet I wake up hot and sweaty.) We will begin research for a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C-G

customer_reviews.title: Plush yet supportive
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than: I am in love with this bed! We have a split king with an adjustable base. This bed is plush, but supportive. We tried sleep number and returned that bed. This was our replacement and we couldn’t be happier. On the weekend I want nothing more than to be in my bed, reclined, watching the tele. I’m a stomach sleeper and my spouse is a back and side sleeper. We are both thoroughly satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cmitchell

customer_reviews.title: Plush memory foam, good value, for guests or master bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has a plush feel, yet it still has good support. For us, we don't need firm support for our backs, so this mattress works well. The great value and convenience of shipping to our door are another bonus. It's easy to set up, just take it out and watch it expand in minutes. Within an hour it was its full size and probably ready, although we waited a day. We put this in our guest room, but we like it as much as our Sealy mattress, so we sometimes use that. Good for either the guest room or master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and now I want to go over just to nap. Perfect blend of soft pillow top and memory foam bed. Honestly he most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept in the only thing that could affect my rating is it’s durability, but if it lasts 5 years it will be worth the money. If you’re looking for a memory foam bed that’s not as firm as the temper pedicure and others, stop looking! You’ve found it.
customer_reviews.author: The Express

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mattress comfort at a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: I was researching mattresses and was ready to spend $2000+ on a new mattress. I came across this mattress and thought I'd give it a try. I was intrigued by the price and easy delivery. My 9 year old daughter and I carried it to my room and unpacked it. I loved it immediately. For me, it is the perfect amount of plush. I've owned it for a year now and the comfort level hasn't changed. It's still perfectly flat when no one is in it. There are no indents where we sleep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moorman

customer_reviews.title: Highest Rating.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing mattress at an amazing price. While it may take a day or so to acclimate to the gel top, the sleeping experience amazing! It truly is a combination of soft and firm. I’m 6’2 and weigh 245 pounds and it provides perfect support. Neither my wife (significantly smaller) can detect when the other moves. Just purchased a second for a guest room.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: It is good.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively good product. It is soft at the top and regular in general. I read some comments about quality of packaging - no bugs are found in the package. Everything is good from this side. The product made in Cambodia as shown on the product sticker.
customer_reviews.author: sergei shalnov

customer_reviews.title: Buy the box spring  with it so it won’t sag or be lumpy
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very comfortable but it needed a full bottom support. The bed I have only had 4 small cross bars and the bed sagged bad and I could feel those bars like a sofa bed until I added enough cross bars, 1”x4”x5’ for queen bed. It would have been easier to just buy the box spring but I wanted a low profile bed. It’s perfect now! My body melts into it and I sleep great.
customer_reviews.author: Konacoffeegal

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only owned a couple weeks so far, but it has been a nice comfortable mattress so far. It's what I'd consider a plush medium. The top is plush, but has support a couple inches down. We've been sleeping very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for two years, and it’s the best darn mattress I’ve ever slept on. I get compliments all the time about it. When my mom visits, I sleep on the sofa because she wants to sleep on my bed haha. It’s so incredibly comfortable & I get such great sleep with it. It’s so comfortable I find it hard to get up in the morning lol. I took a chance purchasing this, but I have no regrets at all. I would recommend to anyone!! It’s freaking fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gonzalez

product_meta.title: LINENSPA 12 Inch Gel Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress - Ultra Plush - Individually Encased Coils - Sleeps Cooler Than Regular Memory Foam - Edge Support - Quilted Foam Cover - Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style Name:12 Inch Mattress OnlyThe LINENSPA 12 Inch Gel Hybrid Mattress is the softest mattress in the LINENSPA line and sleeps cooler than standard memory foam. It combines the conforming properties of memory foam with cooling gel to disperse heat so you can rest easy. The 8-inch, heavy duty, individually wrapped coils are encased with foam for greater comfort and edge support. The 2-inch layer of gel-infused memory foam sits on a layer of transition foam and is topped with a quilted cover that incorporates yet another layer of the cradling memory foam. This high-profile hybrid is the perfect mattress for the newlywed master suite and the guest room down the hall. It is topped with our two-toned mattress cover to provide maximum comfort, value, and aesthetic. Protected by a 10-year warranty against manufacturer defects.
feature_bullets: This high-profile hybrid combines the edge support of an innerspring mattress with the comfort and adaptability of memory foam
Heavy gauge, 8-inch coils topped with transition foam and a 2-inch layer of gel memory foam make this the softest bed in the LINENSPA line
Gel-infused memory foam provides extra support and dissipates heat normally locked in by memory foam
Mattress comes compressed and rolled for shipping and easy setup
Backed by a 10-year warranty against manufacturer defects
100 NIGHT RISK-FREE TRIAL: IF YOU ARE UNSATISFIED WITH THIS MATTRESS, YOU ARE ELIGIBLE FOR A FULL REFUND UP TO 100 DAYS FROM DATE OF RECEIPT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,705 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 10-year u. S. Warranty guards against manufacturer defect.
